Pre-Game Insights: Luka Doncic was listed as 'questionable' due to a left groin strain, putting his availability in doubt for the game against the Denver Nuggets.
Others: Doncic has appeared in all nine of the Mavericks' games this season and led the team in their recent matchup against the Phoenix Suns. He tallied 30 points, seven rebounds and seven assists, though the Mavericks endured a close 114-113 loss.
